original_text: Then the eyes of both of them were opened, and they realized they were naked; so they sewed fig leaves together and made coverings for themselves.
korean_text: 이에 그들의 눈이 밝아져 자기들이 벗은 줄을 알고 무화과나무 잎을 엮어 치마로 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: Then the eyes of both of them were opened
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들 두 사람의 눈이 열렸고

sentences.original_text: and they realized they were naked
so they sewed fig leaves together
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 무화과 잎을 함께 꿰매어
